import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{query,pageQuery,search}from"../asyncThunks/queries.thunk";var queriesSlice=createSlice({name:"queries",initialState:{isPageQueryLoading:false,isSingleQueryLoading:false,isSearchQueryLoading:false,pageQueryError:null,singleQueryError:null,searchQueryError:null,pageQuerydata:[],singleQuerydata:[],searchQueryData:[]},reducers:{},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){//page query
builder.addCase(pageQuery.pending,function(state){state.isPageQueryLoading=true;}).addCase(pageQuery.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isPageQueryLoading=false;state.pageQueryData=action.payload;}).addCase(pageQuery.rejected,function(state,action){state.isPageQueryLoading=false;state.pageQueryError=action.payload;})//single query
.addCase(query.pending,function(state){state.isSingleQueryLoading=true;}).addCase(query.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isSingleQueryLoading=false;state.singleQueryData=action.payload;}).addCase(query.rejected,function(state,action){state.isSingleQueryLoading=false;state.singleQueryError=action.payload;})//search query
.addCase(search.pending,function(state){state.isSearchQueryLoading=true;}).addCase(search.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isSearchQueryLoading=false;state.searchQueryData=action.payload;}).addCase(search.rejected,function(state,action){state.isSearchQueryLoading=false;state.searchQueryError=action.payload;});}});export default queriesSlice.reducer;
